## isDigitizedGroup() function

Determines if the value is a digitized group, which is an array of digitized values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isDigitizedGroup(value: DigitizedValues | DigitizedValue | undefined): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [DigitizedValues](./flipclock.digitizedvalues.md) \| [DigitizedValue](./flipclock.digitizedvalue.md) \| undefined |  |

**Returns:**

boolean
